title: ICE / KIM CHURCH barks
description: Kim reacts to the church getting shot up by the police a few months ago. Creates question option in Kim Main Dialogue.

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Hmm... I heard about the assault a..."
dialogueTree.english: "Hmm... I heard about the assault after it had already gone down."
dialogueTree.polish: „Hmm... Dowiedziałem się o ataku, gdy było już po wszystkim”.
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Гм... Я даведаўся пра напад, калі ўсё было ўжо скончана".

dialogueTree.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What a shame. Look at all the dama..."
dialogueTree.english: "What a shame. Look at all the damage done to the church..."
dialogueTree.polish: „To strasznie. Spójrz tylko na zniszczenia, jakich doznał kościół...”
dialogueTree.belarusian: "Гэта жахліва. Паглядзі толькі на разбурэнні, якія пацярпеў касцёл..."
